script_line.statement: importPackage(Packages.com.csgsystems.workflow.session);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.client);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.common.data);[lf]importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.common.logging);[lf][lf]logger = WPLogger.getLogger("com.workpoint.amdocs.SOA");[lf][lf]try[lf]{[lf] opcManager = OpsCenterManagerUtil.getLocalHome().create();[lf][lf] msgID = ThisJobData.getActivityBulkUserDataString(ThisActivityInstData.getActivityInstID(), "OpsCenterMsgId");[lf] if (msgID != null)[lf] {[lf] opcManager.clearAlarm(msgID, "This is a TEST message form WorkPoint to clear an alarm");[lf] }[lf]}[lf]catch(e)[lf]{[lf] java.lang.System.out.println("In Catch exception: " + e);[lf] logger.warn("WARN::Caught exception: " + e);[lf]}
